definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替换性仅限于修改依赖关系以依赖不同的内容。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 扩充性是指易于修改软件以适应规格变化。

sentences.english: You can modify the code presented here to support only key-press events.
sentences.chinese: 您可以修改本文所示的代码以仅支持按键事件。

sentences.english: Vaccines and even staple food crops have been modified to achieve these goals.
sentences.chinese: 疫苗及甚至主粮作物已被修改去实现这些目标。

sentences.english: Any deletion or amendment must be initialed by all account holders.
sentences.chinese: 任何删除或修改必须由客户签署作实。

sentences.english: The Organisers reserve the right to amend the Schedule of Races should circumstances require.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，本会将保留修改赛程表之权利。

sentences.english: You don't do a fitting when you buy a store-bought suit.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是成衣店购买的衣服，就不可能试穿修改。

sentences.english: Automatic modification of the index register.
sentences.chinese: 自动修改变址寄存器内容。

sentences.english: Road map guide attractions and changes to extensions.
sentences.chinese: 导游图的景点和道路的修改扩充功能。

sentences.english: How to modify a contact number in address book programatically?
sentences.chinese: 如何修改地址簿程序联系号码吗？

sentences.english: Allows modification of the telephony state – power on, mmi, etc.
sentences.chinese: 允许修改话机状态，如电源，人机接口等。

sentences.english: The text of the present edition has been revised, and some additions have been made.
sentences.chinese: 本版的正文已作了修改，并有若干补充。

sentences.english: The necessary modifications can then be made before actual product development commences.
sentences.chinese: 在实际开发产品之前，可以做必要的修改。

sentences.english: All told, there were seven major revisions.
sentences.chinese: 总之，一共有七次重大修改。

sentences.english: The record store is timestamped to denote the last time it was modified.
sentences.chinese: 记录存储被盖上时间戳来指示它上次被修改的时间。

sentences.english: If any edits are made to the document, then the signature will become invalid .
sentences.chinese: 如果任何修改了该文件，然后签署将成为无效。

definition: to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
